Document.Focus: Taking care of your new knee joint

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Taking care of your new knee joint ?
QAPair.Answer: After you have knee replacement surgery , you will need to be careful about how you move your knee, especially for the first few months after surgery. In time, you should be able to return to your previous level of activity. But even then, you will need to move carefully so that you do not injure your new knee replacement. Be sure to get your home ready for when you return, so you can move more easily and prevent falls .
